post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Opportunity Title: Senior Java Developer with solid Mainframe experience
Sourcing Office: Ottawa
Specialization: Software Development
Project Description: Our key GOC client is looking to secure the services of a Senior Web Developer with solid experience working on mainframe (COBOL/CICS and DB2) applications. The selected candidate will be tasked with the following:
- Develops and documents a detailed statement of requirements for the proposed application; - Analyzes functional requirements to identify information, procedures and decision flows; - Evaluates existing procedures and methods, identifies and documents data base content, structure, and application sub-systems, and develops data dictionary; - Defines and documents interfaces of manual to automated operations within sub-systems, to external systems and between new and existing systems; - Defines input/output sources, including detail plan for technical design phase, and obtains approval of the system proposal; - Designs and documents in detail all system components, their interfaces and operational environment; - Designs data structures and files, sub-systems and modules, programs, batch, on line, and production monitoring procedures, testing strategy and systems; - Documents system design, concepts and facilities, presents and obtains approval of detailed system design; and, - Produces an operational system including all forms, manuals, programs, data files and procedures.
Deliverables
- Detailed statement of requirements and technical specifications as per the work list above. - Planned and documented knowledge transfer prior to the end of contract. - Documented lessons learned upon completion of all projects assigned.
Must Have:
Experience as a Senior Java Developer (5 - 7 years)
Experience developing mainframe applications (COBOL/CICS/DB2) (2 - 4 years)
GOC Security Clearance (Mandatory)
Nice To Have Skills:
Start Date: Apr 13, 2009
End Date: Mar 31, 2010
Work Environment: Place du Portage Hull / Existing team / Renewals
If you are interested and qualified for this opportunity, Please browse the following link
https://www1.sisystems.com/index.cfm?mg=cpo.details&uv=%25%260%3BY2%3CT%20%0A
to view the complete opportunity and apply online, it takes less than a minute
(Using this link allows your application to be recorded directly with the client request and forwards your resume, skills matrix and reference information directly to me, from our database, for priority consideration on this opportunity. Applications will not be accepted by phone.)
Thanks for your time and consideration regarding this opportunity Brendan,
Best regards, Carl Robillard
S.i. Systems Ltd - Ottawa
post.title: [CONT] Ottwa, Senior Java Developer with Mainframe exp
